name: Town Area
description: The central town area with shops and the main square

1,0.title: Town Square
1,0.description: You are standing in the center of a bustling medieval town. The cobblestone square is surrounded by various shops and buildings. A fountain bubbles merrily in the center, and townspeople go about their daily business.

1,1.title: The Prancing Pony Inn
1,1.description: A cozy inn with wooden tables and chairs scattered around a large fireplace. The smell of ale and roasted meat fills the air. Travelers and locals alike gather here to share stories and rest.

2,0.title: Blade & Steel Weapons
2,0.description: A well-stocked weapons shop with gleaming swords, sturdy shields, and sharp daggers displayed on the walls. The blacksmith works at his forge in the back.

0,0.title: Mystical Enchantments
0,0.description: A mysterious shop filled with glowing crystals, ancient tomes, and bubbling potions. The air crackles with magical energy.
